page.title: 05The Trout Sisters
page.content: The Trout Sisters were one of the original Hallsands families made homeless by the destruction of the old village. In the summer of 1917 Ella was out checking her crab pots with a young cousin when they saw a cargo ship torpedoed by a german submarine. Ignoring the possible danger from the submarine,Ella rowed over one mile to the stricken craft & was in time to rescue a crewman clinging to flotsum.
